p: Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK), human lung adenocarcinoma epithelial A549 and Calu-3, chicken fibroblast DF-1 cells were obtained from American Type Culture Collection and maintained in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium with L-glutamine, 4.5 g/L glucose and sodium pyruvate (DMEM; Corning) supplemented with 8% fetal bovine serum (FBS, Seradigm) and HEPES (Gibco). A/California/04/2009 wild-type (Cal [NS1_low-PAX_high]) and Cal [NS1_low-PAX_low] viruses were previously generated by reverse genetics [ 14]. Sendai virus Cantel strain was propagated in 10-day-old embryonated chicken eggs.
